Returns: the URI to the audio media table on the given volume
Parameters: String: the name of the volume to get the URI for
getContentUri(java.lang.String).Description: Get the content:// style URI for the audio media table on the given volume.

Parameters: String: This value must never be null.
getContentUriForPath(java.lang.String).Description: Apps may not have filesystem permissions to directly access this path. Get the content:// style URI for the given audio media file.
getContentUriForPath(java.lang.String).history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 29
